docs.lead_paragraph: Up and down the banks of the rain-swollen Delaware River, from the New York border to Delaware Bay, Thursday was a day to take stock of the flooding.

headline.main: In Towns Along Delaware, Treading Water Is Getting to Be a Habit
headline.print_headline: Along Delaware, Treading Water Is Getting to Be a Habit

docs.snippet: Up and down the banks of the rain-swollen Delaware River, from the New York border to Delaware Bay, Thursday was a day to take stock of the flooding.

docs.lead_paragraph: The union representing New York City's school bus drivers is threatening to go on strike next week, a move that could throw a wrench into travel plans for 37,000 children going to summer school.

headline.main: Summer Term Set to Start; Bus Drivers Plan Strike
headline.print_headline: Summer Term Set to Start; Bus Drivers Plan Strike

docs.snippet: The union representing New York City's school bus drivers is threatening to go on strike next week, a move that could throw a wrench into travel plans for 37,000 children going to summer school.

docs.lead_paragraph: The vote all but commits the federal government to buy the vaccine for the nation's poorest girls from 11 to 18.

headline.main: Panel Unanimously Recommends Cervical Cancer Vaccine for Girls 11 and Up
headline.print_headline: Panel Unanimously Recommends Cervical Cancer Vaccine for Girls 11 and Up

docs.snippet: The vote all but commits the federal government to buy the vaccine for the nation's poorest girls from 11 to 18.

docs.lead_paragraph: A new drug for macular degeneration is expected to be 10 to 100 times as expensive as a similar drug that many ophthalmologists say is every bit as good.

headline.main: Questions Over New Eyesight Drug That May Be as Good as Older, Cheaper One
headline.print_headline: Questions Over New Eyesight Drug That May Be as Good as Older, Cheaper One

docs.snippet: A new drug for macular degeneration is expected to be 10 to 100 times as expensive as a similar drug that many ophthalmologists say is every bit as good.

docs.lead_paragraph: A bill that would have required drug companies to make their gifts to physicians public died in the New York State Senate last week.

headline.main: Drug Lobbying Kills Gift Disclosure Bill
headline.print_headline: Drug Lobbying Kills Gift Disclosure Bill

docs.snippet: A bill that would have required drug companies to make their gifts to physicians public died in the New York State Senate last week.
